Text: KatQwerty - you gave given us a lot of fine books, thanks. By any chance, do you have Andrew Solomon's Noonday Demon in mobi/epub?

THank you, KatQwerty.
I was listening to a BBC Radio4 podcast Material World where Shubin was interviewed. What apleasant sirprise to find the book here. 
thanks again. 
from Malaysia. :-)
